Language model

{% raw %}

class TransformerLM[source]

TransformerLM(vocab_sz, dim, n_layers=6, heads=8, causal=True, max_seq_len=512, tie_weights=True, d_ff=None, attn_dropout=0.1, ff_dropout=0.1, emb_dropout=0.1, pos_enc='absolute', pad_idx=None, prenorm=False, axial_shape=None, axial_emb_dims=None, attn_bias=True) :: Module

Basic Transformer for language modelling Parameters:

* vocab_sz: int
* dim: int - inner dimension of the model
* n_layers: int (default: 6)
* heads: int (default: 8)
* causal: bool (default: True) - if True does causal masking automatically
* max_seq_len: int (default: 512)
* tie_weights: bool - if True target embedding weights are used for computation output projection
* pos_enc: str from {'absolute', 'fixed', 'axial'} - type of positional encoding to use

Inputs:

* x - input ids, shape [bs, sl]
* mask - optional boolean mask, shape [bs, sl]

Returns:

* logits - target token logits, shape [bs, sl, vocab_sz]
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
bs = 4
sl = 128
d = 64
x = torch.randint(256, (bs, sl))
model = TransformerLM(256, d, n_layers=2, causal=False)
out = model(x)
out.shape

torch.Size([4, 128, 256])
{% endraw %}

Encoder-Decoder model

{% raw %}

class TransformerEncDec[source]

TransformerEncDec(enc_vocab_sz, dec_vocab_sz, dim, n_layers=6, heads=8, max_seq_len=512, pad_idx=None, tie_weights=True, attn_dropout=0.1, ff_dropout=0.1, enc_emb_dropout=0.1, dec_emb_dropout=0, pos_enc='absolute', d_ff=None, prenorm=False, axial_shape=None, axial_emb_dims=None, comb_attn=False, attn_bias=True, shared_emb=False, enc_n_layers=None, dec_n_layers=None) :: Module

Basic Transformer Encoder-Decoder model Parameters:

* enc_vocab_sz: int - source vocab size
* dec_vocab_sz: int - target vocab size
* dim: int - inner dimension of the model
* n_layers: int (default: 6)
* heads: int (default: 8)
* max_seq_len: int (default: 512)
* pad_idx: int - padding token id, if pad_idx is provided, and no mask/context_mask are passed to
        forward method will be used to generate padding masks
* tie_weights: bool - if True target embedding weights are used for computation output projection
* pos_enc: str from {'absolute', 'fixed', 'axial'} - type of positional encoding to use

Inputs:

* src - source input ids, shape [bs, src_sl]
* tgt - target input ids, shape [bs, tgt_sl]
* src_mask - optional boolean source mask, shape [bs, src_sl]
* tgt_mask - optional boolean target mask, shape [bs, tgt_sl]

Returns:

* logits - target token logits, shape [bs, tgt_sl, tgt_vocab_sz]
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
bs = 4
src_sl = 70
tgt_sl = 80
d = 64
src_vocab_sz = 256
tgt_vocab_sz = 256
src = torch.randint(src_vocab_sz, (bs, src_sl))
tgt = torch.randint(tgt_vocab_sz, (bs, tgt_sl))
model = TransformerEncDec(src_vocab_sz, tgt_vocab_sz, d, n_layers=2)
out = model(src, tgt)
out.shape

torch.Size([4, 80, 256])
{% endraw %}
